EmailTemplate.description: To notify the Salesperson and Sales Manager that a customer has not been contacted in 90 days
EmailTemplate.name: 90 Day No Contact E-mail Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: 90 Day No Contact Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
This is to notify you that your Prospect, {!Opportunity.Account}, has not been contacted in 90 days.
It is very important that all potential Legend customers be contacted at least once every 90 days.
Please take this time to follow-up with {!Opportunity.Account}.
Thank you
